data.title: Live & Archived Video
data.text:
Home > AZ Supreme Court > Live & Archived Video

Oral Argument Live & Archived Videos

Videos and archived recordings of oral arguments are made available to the general public for informational purposes only and do not constitute an official record of court proceedings. Upcoming events are listed by date below. Archived videos are arranged by year for the Arizona Supreme Court, Court of Appeals and other recorded events. When the recording begins, you will see an "In Progress" link. Use that link to watch the event live.

Audio copies of the proceedings are available from the Clerk's Office upon request at (602) 452-3396.
